import { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-scroll'; const Header = () => { const [Showmenu, setShowmenu] = useState(false); const HOME = Showmenu ? 'HOME' : ''; return (
    HOME ABOUT US PRODUCTS
    Solutions & Services Partners Contact us
{/* Mobile Responsive Header */}
setShowmenu(!Showmenu)} >
{Showmenu && }
); }; const MobileMenu = () => { return (
    HOME ABOUT US PRODUCTS Solutions & Services Partners Contact us
); }; export default Header;
